title: Dr Batra's® Nutrigood Shape-Up - Protein Powder For Weight Management - 500 GMS
description: Tired of tasteless proteins that do no good? Say no more, Dr Batra's weight loss powder comes in an irresistible dark chocolate flavor. What's more? Dr Batra's Nutrigood Shape Up- a protein powder for weight loss consists of vitamins, minerals, and active herbal ingredients like Garcinia Cambogia and Green tea; both are potent anti-oxidants that keep your body free of toxins.

cleaned_text: - Description - Consumption Method: - Consumption Method: Tired of tasteless proteins that do no good? Say no more, Dr Batra's weight management powder comes in an irresistible dark chocolate flavor. What's more? Dr Batra's Nutrigood Shape Up consists of vitamins, minerals, and active herbal ingredients like Garcinia Cambogia and Green tea; both are potent anti-oxidants that keep your body free of toxins. Shape Up aids in weight management, improves digestion, and boosts energy levels one scoop at a time. Dr Batra's Protein Powder For Weight Loss Consists of: - 25% Protein - Vitamins - A, C, D3, E, K and B1, B2, B3, B6, B12. - Minerals - Calcium, Magnesium, Iron, Zinc, Selenium, Chromium, Iodine. - Active herbal ingredients Garcinia Cambogia and Green tea - Mix a scoop with water or milk. - We recommend taking two scoop daily without diluting it.
